title: Demotion and Leaverbuster due to server maintenance
body: I'm shocked that I got a leaverbuster penalty AND got demoted due to server maintenance. My friends and I were grouped up in champion select when we were kicked out with no warning. Even worse, we couldnt reconnect until after 5 minutes. This allowed the enemy team to get a massive gold and exp advantage and I had to play without half my team. My whole team still lost LP due to this situation. Riot could you please fix this issue? I already submitted a ticket I just wanted to bring this to the community's attention.
